name: Duo Consulting
tag_list: online-content-management, drupal-consulting, drupal-training, marketing-for-law-firms, content-management-services, social-media-marketing-strategy
overview:
Duo utilizes Drupal open-source technologies to create content-rich websites accessible through desktop and mobile platforms. We help businesses and organizations create web sites and social business platforms that use content to attract and inform visitors. Our active Content Marketing Strategy - Content. Leads. Clients. - drives tangible business results.

Duo Consulting core competencies include:

Enterprise Drupal Specialists in Chicago
User Experience Design for Usability
Mobile Website Design and Development
Social Networks for Business

Clients choose Duo because we:

Have a diverse portfolio of successful projects
Tackle challenging initiatives in partnership with our clients
Bring projects to completion within client-specified constraints
Identify visitor needs to drive site architecture and user experience design
Employ the assets of the Drupal platform to efficiently achieve high quality results
Move legacy content to new environments with speed, accuracy, and efficiency
Offer continued post-launch support with managed hosting and maintenance
Provide a one-stop shop for functional, quality websites that meet business goals and achieve measurable business outcomes

Since 1999, Duo Consulting has remained committed to working in tandem with our clients. Let us help you translate business goals into tangible results.

Contact Michael Silverman, CEO, to get started. 312.529.3010 | msilverman@duoconsulting.com
